message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I believe a price of $11,500 is fair. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you considering my budget. I'm willing to pay $10,500 for the product. This is a fair price considering the value you mentioned.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I see you're serious, but $10,500 is a bit too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
Alice, I understand your position. I'm willing to go up to $10,750. This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product and my budget.
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $10,900. I believe this reflects the true value of the product.
